sentences.en: Antithetical couplet is a kind of traditional literature form, which has a long history.
sentences.cn: 对联是一种传统的文学形式, 有着悠久的历史渊源.

sentences.en: Antithetical to arbitrariness is non - arbitrariness, which includes motivation and iconicity.
sentences.cn: 和任意性对立统一的 是非 任意性, 包括理据性和象似性.

sentences.en: During the spring festival, I wrote an antithetical couplet and hung it on my door.
sentences.cn: 春节时我亲自题写了一副对联,挂在门的两侧.

sentences.en: He has a good grounding in ancient prose, and is good at writing antithetical sentences.
sentences.cn: 他的古文基础不错, 很善于写骈俪文章.

sentences.en: In terms of EMRs, we now have two antithetical requirements.
sentences.cn: 对于电子病历, 我们有两个互相矛盾的需求.

sentences.en: In traditional antithetical couplets, the two parts are strictly antithetical.
sentences.cn: 传统的对联要求上下两句完全对仗.

sentences.en: Making good decisions requires us to balance the seemingly antithetical forces of emotion and rationality.
sentences.cn: 做出好的决定要我需要我们平衡表面对立的感性与理性.

sentences.en: Monopoly and competition are very generally regarded, not simply as antithetical.
sentences.cn: 人们普遍认为垄断和竞争不是相对的,而且互补相容.

sentences.en: On the pillar of this pavilion, there is an antithetical couplet.
sentences.cn: 这座亭子的柱上嵌刻着一副抱柱对儿.

sentences.en: Other or " group one " ties methods and so on antithetical couplet by the relative to solve.
sentences.cn: 其它的均由亲属或 “ 一帮一 ” 结对子等手段来解决.

sentences.en: Sloan: Well, that conception is antithetical to science.
sentences.cn: 斯隆: 嗯, 这种思想与科学是对立的.

sentences.en: The antithetical couplet of new generation , usher in a new epoch hand in hand.
sentences.cn: 其实应该是“携手新世联”, 打错字了呦!

sentences.en: The self - assertive element and the self - transcending element are antithetical.
sentences.cn: 维护自身因素与超越自身因素是相反的.

sentences.en: Their priorities are antithetical to those of environmentalists.
sentences.cn: 他们心中的当务之急和环保人士的想法背道而驰。

sentences.en: Trading on rumors, hunches or fears is antithetical to investing.
sentences.cn: 基于传言 、 预感或恐惧的交易与投资的含义有天壤之别.
